member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.IProfilerService
member.summary: Web service interface to be used by the Telerik Data Access profiler

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.IProfilerService.GetServiceVersion
member.summary: Returns the version of the web service definition.
member.remarks: The version number will be incremented whenever the service contract changes.
member.returns: A version number to detect if client and server can work together.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.IProfilerService.GetOpenAccessVersion
member.summary: Returns the OpenAccess version number.
member.returns: OpenAccess version number of the server side used OpenAccess version.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.IProfilerService.GetServerTimeUTC
member.summary: Returns the UTC time of the server machine. Should be used to sync the client and server time.
member.returns: UTC time of the server machine.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.IProfilerService.GetDatabaseNames
member.summary: Returns all alias names for all opened databases in the process.
member.returns: Alias names for all opened databases in the process.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.IProfilerService.GetMetrics(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a list of Telerik Data Access metrics.
member.param: The name of the database instance generating these metrics
Timestamp to restrict the history of metrics.
member.returns: List of Telerik Data Access metrics.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.IProfilerService.GetEventsById(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of Telerik Data Access log events.
member.param: The name of the database instance generating these metrics
Integer value to restrict the history of the log events.
member.returns: List of Telerik Data Access log events.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.IProfilerService.GetEventsByDate(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a list of Telerik Data Access log events.
member.param: The name of the database instance generating these metrics
Timestamp to restrict the history of log events.
member.returns: List of Telerik Data Access log events.

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.ServiceHostManager
member.summary: Manager for the Telerik Data Access profiler web service.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.ServiceHostManager.StartProfilerService(System.String)
member.summary: Starts the web service if the configuration file contains settings.
member.remarks: The applications configuration file (app.config ore web.config) has to contain a port setting to start the server. If no port setting has been found, the server is not started.
member.param: The name of the key in the application settings in the configuration file.
member.returns: Null if the server has been started or no configuration could be found, an exception if the server could not be started.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.ServiceHostManager.StartProfilerService(System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts the web service on a specific port.
member.param: The tcp port the server should use.
member.returns: Null if the server has been started, an exception if the server could not be started.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ServiceHost.ServiceHostManager.StopProfilerService
member.summary: Stops the running service host.
